Content.BodyCopy:
[N-327] Advanced Physical Assessment Number of Hours  

Credit hours: 4: 3 hours theory/week
Total theory hours are calculated on a 1 credit hour: 1 theory hour ratio and are based on a 16-week semester compressed into 14 weeks.
1x3 = 3 hours/week x 16 = 48 hours/semester.
Total clinical/lab hours per semester are calculated on a 1 credit hour: 3 clinical hours ratio and are based on a 16-week semester compressed into 14 weeks. Faculty may choose to plan individual experiences to equal the total number of hours as needed related to optimal experiences, testing, holidays, etc.

[N-330/400] Advanced Med/Surg / Advanced Nursing Concepts Number of Hours

Credit hours: 5, Theory: 3 hours allotted for theory, Clinical: 2 hours allotted for clinical
2 credits x 3 (ratio number approved) = 6 hours of clinical per week x 16 weeks in the semester = 96 hours/semester required for clinical.
Total Clinical/lab hours per semester are calculated on a 1 credit hour: 3 clinical hours ratio and are based on a 16-week semester. Faculty may choose to plan individual experiences to equal the total number of hours as needed related to optimal experiences, testing, holidays, etc. Thirty-six (36) hours are deducted from the 96, giving credit for 1) orientation time at the individual health care facilities; 2) organization time fulfilling preceptor agreements; 3) previous learning.
